tool.name: Fuzzy Landform Element Classification
tool.description: Algorithm for derivation of form elements according to slope, maximum curvature, minimum curvature, profile curvature, tangential curvature, based on a linear semantic import model for slope and curvature and a fuzzy classification Based on the AML script 'felementf' by Jochen Schmidt, Landcare Research.

param.name: INPUT
param.label: Input
param.help: if elevation is selected, slopes and curvatures will be calculated internally

param.name: T_SLOPE_MIN
param.label: Slope Thresholds [Degree] (min value)
param.help: lower and upper thresholds for semantic import model, planar vs. sloped areas

param.name: T_SLOPE_MAX
param.label: Slope Thresholds [Degree] (max value)
param.help: lower and upper thresholds for semantic import model, planar vs. sloped areas

param.name: T_CURVE_MIN
param.label: Curvature Thresholds [1000 / m] (min value)
param.help: lower and upper thresholds for semantic import model, straight vs. curved areas

param.name: T_CURVE_MAX
param.label: Curvature Thresholds [1000 / m] (max value)
param.help: lower and upper thresholds for semantic import model, straight vs. curved areas
